general_advisory: District is likely to receive light rainfall on Tuesday , Wednesday and Thursday , do not go for application of any pesticides on these days.

advisory: Transplanted rice is at milking to soft dough stage. After rain crop is likely to be infested by ear cutting caterpillar , go for application of 2g of Chloropyriphos + cypermethrin) per litre of water .

To control Argulosis in winter go for application of Cypermethrin 15ml/acre three times in five days interval. Reduce the amount of feed as the growth rate is low in winter . Use of water heater in the ornamental fish aquarium/tank.

In view of upcoming reduced temperature make provision for 2 watt light bulb per chick to ensure their health from cold wave. In case of backyard poultry , birds should be allowed to move in open yard in the daytime. Water should be given at ambient temperature at 2 times feed intake. Feed to water ratio should be maintained at 1:5 as against1:2 during winter .
